remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合物件 ( ) 經由控制項的屬性。The collection of objects (the ) is accessed through the control's property. 控制項會自動建立的集合物件，當您設定至適當的資料來源的屬性。The control automatically creates a collection of objects for you when you set the property to an appropriate data source. 建立的物件實際上是其中一個會繼承下列類別的執行個體:或類別。The objects created actually are instances of one of the following classes that inherit from : or class. 若要格式化的資料顯示，設定屬性格式化值的其中一個類別。To format the data display, set the property of the class to one of the formatting values. 如需有效的格式化值的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)並[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information about valid formatting values, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 您也可以建立您自己的一組物件，並將其新增至。You can also create your own set of objects and add them to the . 當您這樣做時，您必須設定的每個資料行樣式的與實際的資料同步處理的資料行顯示。When you do so, you must set the of each column style to the of a to synchronize the display of columns with the actual data. > [!CAUTION] > 一律會建立物件，並將其新增至之前新增物件至。Always create objects and add them to the before adding objects to the . 當您將加入空的有效值加入集合中，自動為您產生的物件。When you add an empty with a valid value to the collection, objects are automatically generated for you. 因此，將會擲回例外狀況如果您嘗試加入新物件具有重複值來。Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new objects with duplicate values to the . 當在衍生類別的其中一個具現化控制項，建立的類別取決於的相關聯物件。When one of the derived classes is instantiated by a control, the class created depends on the of the associated with the object. 例如，使用其設為`System.Boolean`相關聯。For example, a with its set to `System.Boolean` will be associated with a . 若要判斷任何型別，使用方法。To determine the type of any , use the method. 若要建立您自己的資料行類別，您可以繼承自。To create your own column classes, you can inherit from . 您可能想要執行此動作以建立主控制項的特殊資料行，如同類別，哪些主機控制項。You might want to do this in order to create special columns that host controls, as exemplified by the class, which hosts the control. 例如，您可以在其中裝載控制要顯示資料行中的圖片，或您可以建立自己的使用者控制項來裝載資料行中。For example, you can host an control to show pictures in columns, or you can create your own user control to host in the column. 功能不應該混淆與。The functionality of the shouldn't be confused with that of the . 然而包含的屬性和方法適用於建立資料表的結構描述，包含的屬性和方法與在螢幕上的個別資料行的外觀。Whereas the contains the properties and methods appropriate to creating a data table's schema, the contains the properties and methods related to the appearance of an individual column on the screen. 如果資料列都包含，可以使用設定資料行中顯示的文字屬性。If a row contains a , the text displayed in the column can be set with the property. 類別也可讓您指定資料行的行為，而正在變更其資料。The class also allows you to specify the behavior of a column while its data is being changed. 和方法暫停繪製資料行的資料行的資料進行大量更新時。The and methods temporarily suspend the drawing of the column while large updates are being made to the column's data. 沒有這項功能，每個資料格中的方格中的每一項變更會立即繪製;這可能是令人分心的使用者和效能負擔。Without this functionality, every change in every cell of the grid would be immediately drawn; this could be distracting to the user and a performance liability. 數個方法可以讓使用者在編輯時，資料行的監視包括和事件。Several methods allow monitoring of the column as it is edited by the user, including the and events. 大部分的屬性和類別的方法是專門針對控制資料行的外觀。Most of the properties and methods of the class are tailored to controlling a column's appearance. 但有幾個，例如和可讓您檢查和變更中指定的儲存格的值。But a few, such as the and allow you to examine and change the value in a specified cell. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立裝載控制項。The following code example creates a that hosts a control. [!code-cpp[DataGridColumnStyle Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridColumnStyle Overview/CPP/timecolumn.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataGridColumnStyle Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridColumnStyle Overview/CS/timecolumn.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataGridColumnStyle Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridColumnStyle Overview/VB/timecolumn.vb#1)]

summary.span: 暫停繪製資料行，直到呼叫 方法為止。

span.span: Suspends the painting of the column until the method is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 許多變更對時的外觀控制項 （不管所做的變更是在資料行或資料控制項所顯示的屬性），您應該會叫用方法來暫時凍結控制項的繪圖。When many changes are made to the appearance of a control (whether the changes are in the attributes of the column or the data displayed by the control), you should invoke the method to temporarily freeze the drawing of the control. 這會導致較不必分心的使用者，並提升效能。This results in less distraction to the user, and a performance gain. 進行完所有更新之後，叫用方法繼續繪製控制項。After all updates have been made, invoke the method to resume drawing of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 許多變更對時的外觀控制項 （不管所做的變更是在資料行或資料控制項所顯示的屬性），您應該會叫用方法來暫時凍結控制項的繪圖。When many changes are made to the appearance of a control (whether the changes are in the attributes of the column or the data displayed by the control), you should invoke the method to temporarily freeze the drawing of the control. 這會導致較不必分心的使用者，並提升效能。This results in less distraction to the user, and a performance gain. 進行完所有更新之後，叫用方法繼續繪製控制項。After all updates have been made, invoke the method to resume drawing of the control.
